A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke was a different character all together. The kamikaze scene was beautiful but Admiral Holdo was unnecessarily keeping secret plans from Poe. Rey was again too powerful beyond reason. Snoke was wasted. Rose was a blatant forced diversity. Nobody cares about diversity in movies as long as they make sense and feel natural. No hate on the actors. I'm rooting for Kylo Ren to be even more prominent in the next one.
